content.rendered:
Welcome, Please make use of our Loan Calculator first before applying

Building A Brighter Financial Future

Loan Calculator

Simple & Secure Payment Process

Connecting Your Loan Needs

Apply For Loan

Quick Payment Process

No Prepayment Fees

Company Introductions

Flexible and Quick Loan Options For Everyone

Get up to ₦500,000 personal loan amount on Mycredit.ng for 6 months

 

Whether you’re a student, employed or run your own business, our general loans of up to ₦6,000,000 for 24 months can help you meet your needs conveniently

Award Winning

Finance categories winning more than 3 awards in Africa and beyond

Less Documentations

Even without user identity verification, You can access up to 500k loan amount on Mycredit

Easy Loan Application

Select Loan tenure & amount, activate your account with Paystack and get loan amount in 20 Minutes

Mycredit Loan Calculator

To proceed, use the loan calculator to see our rates and determine how much you can borrow
Month Month

Months

Use Calculator Now

What We’re Offering

All Loans Services

Car Loan

Car Loan provide low interest many variations of passages of lorem ipsum available the majority have some.

Wedding Loan

For Couple provide easy and affordable with easy process lorem ipsum minim veniam aute irure lorm.

Property Loan

Everyone want to buy property so people want to buy home, land or commercial properly low interest.

In Nigeria & Beyond

Have A Dream Business? Let's Get You Up And Running

Apply for a convenient loan to meet needs like growing your small business, renovating your home, buying a new car, paying rent, school fees, medical bills, etc.

 

Very Low Rates on All Loans

99.9% Success Rate Guarantee

Flexible with Your Repayments

Trusted Company

Most of the People Trust on Us For Fast Services

Not only do we offer all types of loan, mycredit.ng also offers the best low interest rates in the market

  • Personal loans
  • Business Loans
  • Education loans
  • Car loans
  • No Guarantor Required
  • No Collateral Required
  • No Hidden Fees
  • Get Funds Within 20 Minutes
1

Easy loan solutions for small agency, personal purposes, business and companies
2

Select Loan tenure & amount

3

Select a loan plan and fill in the necessary details

4

Activate your Mycredit account with Paystack and receive funds within 20 minutes

Customers Testimonials

Customers Testimonials

Not your regular loan sharks who disgrace you at any moment. I really love your staffs, they are understanding

Adeyemi Daniel

User

Even without submitting my BVN, I was able to get a loan of 40k. Thanks mycredit, best so far

Ijenu Franko

User

I am very impresed by the company's staffs, now this is the real definition of a certified loan lending platform

Chiamka Odiegwu

User

3 years of working experience

Our Benefits

Why Choose Us?

Even with less documentations, we provide the best and flexible loan options for everyone. Enjoy the best low rates with us!

Mycredit.ng will never invade your privacy nor request your BVN, watch out for impersonators. 

  • Professional Team

Don’t know what exactly you want? Our experts are always active for a chat

  • Quick Payments

Upon account activation with Flutterwave, Loan amount is automatically approved. 

Loan Process

90%

Consultancy

80%

Payment Benefits

%
